titles.title: Tis So Sweet To Trust In Jesus

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Jesus, Jesus
how I trust Him!

How I've proved Him
o'er and o'er!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Jesus, Jesus,
precious Jesus!

O for grace
to trust Him more!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
'Tis so sweet
to trust in Jesus,

Just to take Him
at His word;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Just to rest
upon His promise;

Just to know
"Thus saith the Lord."

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
O how sweet
to trust in Jesus,

Just to trust
His cleansing blood;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Just in simple faith
to plunge me,

'neath the healing,
cleansing flood!

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Yes, 'tis sweet
to trust in Jesus,

Just from sin
and self to cease;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Just from Jesus
simply taking

Life and rest
and joy and peace.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
I'm so glad
I learned to trust Thee,

Precious Jesus,
Savior friend;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
And I know
that Thou art with me,

Wilt be with me
to the end.
